2019-2020 Educational Support Professionals of the Year
District Educational Support Professional of the Year: Kayla Ecke

strong.span: NJ CARES Planning Template for Nonpublic Schools (click here)

April 16, 2020 - Governor Phil Murphy announced that all schools will remain closed through at least May 15, 2020, at which time, he will reassess whether or not schools will open or remain closed. Lakewood Public School District will continue Remote Learning (guidelines below).
Lakewood School District's 2020 Remote Learning Guidelines & Expectations (English) (Spanish)

span.span: Marking Period 3 Report Cards Now Available on the Parent Portal (Click for Video Instructions) (Spanish)
Fundraiser for Ella G. Clarke Family member (click for GoFundMe Info)
Covid-19 Testing Centers - Free, Regardless of Legal Status (click for info) (Spanish)
The "Virtual" NP Consultation Meeting scheduled for 10:30 a.m. on March 31, 2020, is canceled and will be rescheduled.

span.img: Coronavirus Information and Help - Updated daily to provide our community with the latest updates (click to view)

span.strong: Tutorial de Google Classroom para Padres (click to view)

strong.img: Student Meals (Breakfast and Lunch) will be delivered to your regularly scheduled morning bus stop.

span.strong: Student Meals (Breakfast and Lunch) will also be available for pickup at all Schools from 7:00 a.m. - 8:00 a.m.

span.img: Chromebook Wifi - Use your home wifi or select optimumwifi for access (no username or password required). Altice / Optimum is working to keep up with the demand. (click for info)

strong.span: High School Students Needing "Work Papers" - please fill out the paperwork and email your Principal, Mrs. Rivera erivera@lakewoodpiners.org

Ocean County Health Department Guidelines for COVID-19

span.strong: The Lakewood School District "Virtual" Board of Education Meeting is scheduled for April 22, 2020 at 7:30 p.m. Members of the Public may view the meeting via live stream from the Lakewood School District website and the Lakewood Scoop.
Public Comment can be made by emailing:

TOWNSHIP OF LAKEWOOD BOARD OF EDUCATION REGULAR MEETING Live-Streamed
In accordance with the Open Public Meetings Act, P.L. 1975 c. 231 this is to advise that the Lakewood Board of Education will hold a Regular Meeting on Wednesday, April 22, 2020. Executive Session at 6:30 p.m. and Public Session will open at 7:30 p.m. The meeting will be live-streamed through the District Website: www.lakewoodpiners.org.

If you have any questions in regard to this notice, please contact the Business Office during regular business hours from 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. at (732) 364-2400 ext. 7044 or emailing to kcampbell@lakewoodpiners.org
Kevin Campbell, CPA, PSA, SBA, QPA
Assistant Business Administrator/Board Secretary
